header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED ON CONSIDERATION OF COMMONS AMENDMENTS

text.quote: 000: After Clause 1, Baroness Smith of Basildon to move, as an amendment to the motion that this House do agree with the Commons in their Amendment 1, leave out “agree” and insert “disagree”.
000: Clause 26, Baroness Meacher to move, as an amendment to the motion that this House do agree with the Commons in their Amendment 6, leave out “agree” and insert “disagree”.
